22.Name: Resonance Skill DMG Amplification
22.Desc: Provides Resonance Skill DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

Name: Lumi
Desc:
Navigator at <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> and leader of a transport squad.
Born in a mountain village in Yuezhou, Lumi's sincere and caring nature brings warmth to everyone around her.

CharaInfo.Info:
Navigator at <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> and leader of a transport squad.
Born in a mountain village in Yuezhou, Lumi's sincere and caring nature brings warmth to everyone around her.
CharaInfo.TalentDoc:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 1159-G]

The exact timing of Resonator Lumi's Awakening is unclear. Spontaneous luminescence was observed since her childhood, and she gradually gained control over light.

Resonator Lumi's <te href=850072>Tacet Mark</te> is located on her right leg. Post-Awakening observations have not found any significant physical changes.

Lumi's Resonance Spectrum Pattern mirrors the characteristics of light. When she utilizes her Forte, she can convert light into Electro energy and supply it to specific materials.

Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent <te href=850067>Rabelle's Curve</te> with a noticeable periodic waveform. Therefore, Lumi is classified as a <te href=850068>Congenital Resonator</te>.
CharaInfo.TalentCertification:
Resonator Lumi's waveform graph shows elliptical fluctuations. The Time Domain pattern is regular, and no abnormal waveforms are observed.

Resonant Criticality: High. Resonator Lumi possesses high stability with minimal risk of <te href=850073>Overclocking</te>.

Records indicate no history of Overclocking.

Routine examinations are advised, with no current need for psychological counseling.

Stories.Title: Mountain Memories
Stories.Content:
Outside an old house in Yuezhou lies a patch of reeds beside a lake. To the north, the water narrows; to the south, it widens, resembling a sliced pear, with the surface shimmering under the night sky.

The summer air hung thick with heat, lulling the world into a drowsy stupor.

In the quiet of the evening, Lumi nestled in her mother's arms on a rocking chair by the window. Her eyelids drooped as she gazed out sleepily. The soft breeze from a fan brushed her skin, making her squint with contentment. The chorus of insects filled the yard, and Lumi curled even closer to her mother, lulled by the comforting sounds of the village.
 
This small place was Changzhuang. No one could quite remember why it was called that, but they grew accustomed to this name over time.

The disasters following the <te href=850075>Lament</te> had spread across all of <te href=850093>Huanglong</te>. Even here, deep in the mountains of Yuezhou, they had left their indelible mark by cutting the village off from the outside world—technology crumbled, and the villagers returned to the old ways—farming, hunting, surviving as their ancestors once had. Life was dictated by the rising and setting sun. Over time, people in Changzhuang became used to the peace and simplicity of this lifestyle.

The day Lumi was born, the whole house lit up. The swaddled infant glowed softly, catching the eye of every villager. They gathered in the yard, curious to see the newborn who shone like a small beacon. Resonators were rare here, and ones like Lumi, with such innate power, were even rarer. But in a village as tranquil as Changzhuang, there were no grand challenges that even needed a child Resonator to solve. Therefore, Lumi grew up carefree, just like other ordinary children in the village. She learned the ways of the mountains and fields—how to track wild animal traces and how to distinguish which plants might sate a hungry belly.

People in Changzhuang enjoyed cooling off under the shade of a tree. As Lumi ran through the trees with her friends, her inborn light flickered as if performing a cheerful dance. The village elders lovingly called her "Sunshine," while her friends dubbed her "Lumi the Firefly." Yet Lumi often wondered about her strange gift, unsure of its purpose. More often than not, it was a nuisance. On hunting trips, her light would flash uncontrollably, startling prey.

After being asked to temporarily sit out from the hunts, Lumi's heart sank with a pang of frustration. Alone, she wandered to the marshes by the reeds and sat down. Her glow flickered, dimmed, and then brightened again as she practiced, trying to control the light. Finally, exhaustion set in, and she drifted off to sleep. Despite her struggles, Lumi never felt rushed. 

Life in Changzhuang was slow, and there was always time to grow and to learn. 

The shimmering surface of the lake returned to darkness. The night breeze ferried the croaks of frogs away. Tomorrow was another day.

Stories.Title: Towards the Horizon
Stories.Content:
"Tuesday, clear skies. I watched the sunset from Caidong Peak! But Zhangzhang didn't come… She seems to have lost interest in this kind of thing..."

Lumi paused and closed her notebook in the golden light of the setting sun.

It was a thick hardcover notebook—a birthday gift from her parents, one she had chosen herself. Once a diary, it had transformed into an exploration journal as she grew older. As a child, Lumi was content wandering the pebble paths of Changzhuang, but now, those paths felt too small. Her curiosity stretched beyond the borders of the village. She longed for the roads that led to the world outside. 

The only problem was—no one had found those roads in a long, long time.

Her father once told her about the many failed attempts. Over the years, many had tried to find a way beyond the mountains, but all had returned empty-handed, lost, or worse. Eventually, the villagers gave up, their focus shifting to more immediate concerns. Life in Changzhuang was demanding—farming from spring to autumn, then bracing for the long winter when the mountains would disappear under a blanket of silver frost, making exploration impossible.

Lumi understood the demands of life, yet her curiosity and yearning for adventure burned even brighter. She quickly gathered a group of friends and formed a small exploration team, determined to find a way out. But despite their excitement, failure kicked in—the aftermath of the <te href=850075>Lament</te> had seemingly twisted the terrain, eliminating every possible way out, just like it had their forebears.

At first, the setbacks didn't bother them. They were kids, after all, full of energy and hope. But as time passed, they drifted away. The older ones joined the labor teams, others lost interest. Lumi's once lively group dwindled, and today, her exploration ended earlier than planned as everyone was eager to hurry home before dusk settled in.

Lumi sighed. 

She knew that for most of her friends, this was just a way to pass the time. 

She stood up, cupped her hands around her mouth, and shouted toward the mountains, her voice echoing against the rocks and trees before fading into the evening air.

The sunset blazed across the sky, casting the horizon in shades of red and gold before melting into the soft kiss of the night. 

Lumi smiled, patting her cheeks lightly. It didn't matter. The thrill of discovering something new, something unknown, still filled her with excitement.

"…Oh! I'll tell Zhangzhang all about the view when we meet for ice pops tonight. And Beihai, Ming…"

She whispered the names of her friends as she waved goodbye to the mountains, then turned and made her way down the hill, alone but content.

Stories.Title: Neon City
Stories.Content:
"You're awake? Here, drink this."

As her eyes fluttered open, her parched lips met the cool, sweet droplets of water. Her hand instinctively gripped the container, and she eagerly gulped it down.

"Easy now, don't rush," the voice urged, gentle and concerned. "You'll choke if you drink too fast."

As the last drop slipped down her throat, Lumi blinked, her mind finally clearing. She looked up at the faces of her rescuers—a small squad, three of them, dressed in similar clothing. Their leader, a girl with a kind smile, helped her sit up.

"Are you from around here? That's a surprise. We were told there's no one living in these parts," the girl said, a hint of curiosity in her voice. "Guess we'll need to update our map."

"Thank you… for saving me," Lumi whispered, her words faltering. The world she knew was small, confined to the mountains and the narrow boundaries of Changzhuang. "A-are you from the outside?"

The squad exchanged glances, and it was then that Lumi noticed the emblem on their uniforms—a chubby hamster wearing a straw hat, grinning adorably.

A hand reached out, helping Lumi to her feet. 

"Sorry for the late introduction. We're from <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>, a delivery squad."
 
Months later, Chengxiao smiled, setting down the comb and patting Lumi's shoulder. 

"Take a look. How do you feel?"

Lumi stared at her reflection, stunned by the unfamiliar face in the mirror. The girl staring back at her had neat curls and wore a clean, fitted Lollo Logistics uniform—looking every bit the city dweller she had become.

Chengxiao, the leader of the squad that had rescued her, had taken Lumi from the quiet of Changzhuang to the bustling city and taken her under her wing. She was quick-witted, reliable, and now Lumi's mentor at Lollo Logistics.

"I look… different," Lumi muttered, scratching her head shyly. "Thank you, Chengxiao."

"None of that formality now," Chengxiao laughed. "I'm off to deliver some documents. Cafeteria later?"

"Sure!"

As the door closed, Lumi returned to stare at the mirror, her gaze lingering on her reflection for a while. 

Having just passed the Lollo Logistics assessment, she was still adjusting to city life. The city was a whirlwind compared to the quiet village she had left behind. The streets buzzed with life, day and night. Even in the dead of night, lights flickered, and voices filled the air. Walls and doors were everywhere, and restrictions at every corner. In Changzhuang, she could run free, straight through the open land for as long as she wanted. Here, every step had to be measured carefully. The crowded markets left her both energized and overwhelmed.

"Take it slow, Lumi," she murmured to herself. "No rush. No rush…"

Grabbing her straw hat, Lumi took a deep breath and opened the door, ready to face the city once more.

Stories.Title: Through Waters and Mountains
Stories.Content:
"Squeakie, I'm feeling dizzy…" 

Lumi murmured, leaning against the edge of the bed as the ship rocked beneath her. The waves crashed against the hull with a roar, and the violent turbulence made one feel like it might drag them into the depths. She clutched her hamster plushie tightly, closing her eyes, waiting for this torturous journey to end.

Days later, the port finally came into view, where the sea met the sky. Seagulls squawked in the distance, and Lumi exhaled a breath of relief as she stepped onto solid ground. "Thank goodness," she muttered. Her two companions, Tangtang and Fulei, staggered behind her, still pale from seasickness. 

"You two okay?" Lumi ran her fingers through her curls and led them to a nearby bench for rest.

"Lumi, was it this bad when you first came to <te href=850096>Rinascita</te>?" Tangtang, his head still drooping, asked.

Lumi chuckled. "Oh yeah! That's why I told you to stay fit. There are places way harder to reach than this."

Tangtang groaned, nodding. "Why did you recover so quickly? You were just as seasick as us a moment ago..."

Lumi grinned, remembering her first trip here with Chengxiao. "Trust me, I was just as bad. My legs felt weak, I wanted to throw up, and I almost swore never to set foot on a ship again!"

Fulei nodded in agreement, "The ship did rock hard. It was terrifying…"

Tangtang and Fulei were newbies who just joined <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> and were assigned to Lumi's team for training. Lollo Logistics had entrusted her with guiding them through the ropes, but leading a team? Lumi wasn't so sure she was ready for that kind of responsibility. It wasn't because she hated caring for others; she was just worried that she might not meet these hopeful newcomers' expectations. Chengxiao had always made it look easy—could she really do the same?
 
"Lumi," Tangtang said, interrupting her thoughts, "You always talk about Chengxiao, but I've never seen her at the branch. Where is she?"

"She doesn't work in the field anymore," Lumi replied softly.

"What? But didn't you say she was an 'Outstanding Navigator' every year? Why would she quit?" Fulei asked, wide-eyed.

Lumi gazed up at the blue sky, the expanse above <te href=850097>Ragunna</te> remarkably clear. 

"Because... of life," she explained, as she had once before in her childhood. "Sometimes life leads you down different paths. Solaris is huge, and being in Lollo Logistics means traveling year-round. Chengxiao wanted something more stable, so she moved on."

Tangtang tilted her head. "And what about you? Did your family mind you doing this?"

"They had their concerns," Lumi admitted. "But this is my life, and I love it—traveling, seeing new things, connecting people across <te href=850079>Solaris</te>. That's what Lollo Logistics is all about. Chengxiao taught me a lot, and I'll do my best to pass it on to you both."

Her words hung in the air as the two newcomers considered them. 

Lumi smiled. "Life is full of comings and goings," she continued. "Some people get off the ship, others get on. But as long as there are those willing to carry the torch, our 'We Promise, We Deliver' motto will keep going strong."

Lumi stood up and gave a good stretch. Squeakie perched on her shoulder, nuzzling her cheek. "Rest for another ten minutes, then we're off. Oh, you want some famous Ragunna's triple scoop ice cream? My treat!"

"Yes!"

"Please!"

Stories.Title: On the Road
Stories.Content:
Ever since its connection to the outside world resumed, Changzhuang had experienced a dramatic change. New buildings and amenities were everywhere, yet when Lumi returned home, she felt a deep wave of nostalgia.

Perhaps those who longed for change had already departed, like Lumi once before, while those who remained had maintained their old habits and daily rhythms. The sun was dipping low, and as she walked through the village, smoke from cooking fires curled lazily into the sky, mingling with the sounds of laughter and the hum of evening insects.

Her parents welcomed her home, placing a steaming bowl of noodles in front of her—the meat was generous, the broth rich, supplemented by a spoonful of fragrant chili oil. 

Lumi dug in, the heat making her cheeks flush as she slurped the noodles eagerly. Her mother chuckled softly, passing her a glass of water.

"Slow down, Lumi, no one's going to steal your food," her mother teased.

After a deep sip of water and broth, she leaned back, letting out a contented sigh.

Her father, seated nearby, tapped his pipe. "Been away for a long time, huh? How's your work?"

Lumi smiled. "It's been tough, but things are getting better. Someone really helped me out—a hero from <te href=850091>Jinzhou</te>, actually!"

Her mother raised an eyebrow, amused. "Oh? Our little Lumi rubbing elbows with big shots now?"

Lumi laughed, her eyes bright. "It's true! I was struggling with some work stuff, but thanks to {Male=him;Female=her}, I turned it all around. Here's what happened…"
 
The next morning, with the village still shrouded in the quiet calm of dawn, Lumi left home to enjoy the morning landscape of the fields. It hadn't changed beyond recognition. It still bore the vestiges of the place that had shaped her. 

She wandered without aim, lost in thought until a gentle pat on the shoulder brought her back to the present.

"Lumi? What are you doing all the way out here?"

Lumi blinked and turned to see Zhangzhang, her childhood friend, standing behind her, smiling.

"Oh, Zhangzhang! I was just… reminiscing. It's been a while." Lumi's gaze drifted to the newly paved road winding through the hills. "I can't even tell where we are."

Zhangzhang laughed. "Yeah, it just got finished recently—much smoother than before, huh? It was once your favorite place, you remember?" She shifted her gaze to the road and continued, "Not many people come through, though. But I hear your <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> team visits regularly." Zhangzhang paused, intrigued, "Speaking of which, have you been to any cool places lately? Anything to share? You see, I've been thinking about leaving to see the world for myself as well…"

Lumi nodded and began recounting her latest adventures, sharing the tales of distant cities and unknown lands with her childhood friend.

When they parted ways, Lumi found a stone by the road and sat on it, propping her chin up as she gazed at the sky. She knew that she had to move forward—only then would she see new things, bring about change, and make a difference for others.

As night faded, the first light of morning washed over the slumbering mountains. 

There in the distance, where the mountain path met the sky, the familiar silhouette of a Lollo Logistics vehicle, glimmering in the sun, was approaching Changzhuang.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: I
Voices.Content: Hey, I've been hearing about you for ages! How? <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> has stations everywhere, so news travels fast! And, in case you don't know, you're the talk of <te href=850091>Jinzhou</te>!

Voices.Title: Thoughts: II
Voices.Content: This Terminal ringtone? Yeah, I made it! Thought it'd be a cool way to get the <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> name out there… It's catchy, right? My colleagues thought so too and all started using it. Now it's ringing everywhere.

Voices.Title: Thoughts: III
Voices.Content: This is Squeakie, my plushie. Here, give it a squeeze—isn't it adorable? I made it when I first joined <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>. Everything was new, I mean, scarily new… and I was super nervous about the job… So having Squeakie around was such a comfort!

Voices.Title: Thoughts: IV
Voices.Content: My nail polish is all chipped off… Time for a new color! When I first moved to the city, I tried all sorts of looks so I could fit in, but always ended up looking silly! Now… Now I've found my own style. So, what color d'you think I should go with?

Voices.Title: Thoughts: V
Voices.Content: I never left my village growing up, but once I did, I became a restless traveler. Riding my bike with the wind in my ears just feels amazing. I keep meeting new people, and saying goodbye to them… it's all part of the journey, isn't it? I bet you're the same, always on the move. Great way of living, right? I think... we'll surely meet again somewhere down the road. And when we do, let's grab some local food and catch up on our adventures!

Voices.Title: Lumi's Hobby
Voices.Content: I jot down all the interesting sights, people, and events in my travel journal. If words don't cut it, I sketch it out. I've filled up so many journals since joining <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>!

Voices.Title: Lumi's Trouble
Voices.Content: There's never enough time! Delivering packages, planning new routes, catching up with friends, keeping my journal... Oh I wish I could be in a million places at once！

Voices.Title: Favorite Food
Voices.Content: Rice noodles are my absolute favorite! Spice it up with chili, a dash of vinegar, sprinkle some green onions... delicious! Next time you're in Yuezhou, I'll treat you!

Voices.Title: Disliked Food
Voices.Content: Hmm... What did they call it? Some local speciality noodle I tried during a delivery, with this golden fish broth and green veggies. Did NOT taste as good as it looked—ugh, it was so bitter! Never again!

Voices.Title: Ideals
Voices.Content: Wow, ever since we got a road in our village, things have been crazy! We've built so much new stuff. I've been keeping an eye on my team, making sure everyone's good—some want promotions, some need more cash for their fams, and some wanna travel. Hehe, busy days, but it feels great to be needed... I should keep it up!

Voices.Title: Chat: I
Voices.Content: This on my head? It's my employee ID badge. Clipped it to my hair to save myself the fumbling when I'm carrying stuff. Now everyone knows my name in a snap. Perfect!

Voices.Title: Chat: II
Voices.Content: That day, I left my village, hiked over the mountain, farther than anyone else had gone before. I soon found myself in a vast field, the air fresh and damp with dew. I was so pumped that I started to glow, and the light attracted <te href=850081>Tacet Discords</te>... Did everything I could to fight them off, then I blacked out. Next thing I knew, a <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te> team saved me, their lights cutting through the darkness, the brightest I've ever seen.

Voices.Title: About Jianxin
Voices.Content: When I am out delivering packages, I can't always find a place to stay, so sometimes I rest outdoors. Once, I woke up to see Miss Jianxin napping on a boulder on the cliff edge! She seemed... so light, like a feather...

Voices.Title: About Chixia
Voices.Content: Ma Xiao...oops, I mean Chixia, hehe! Ahem, <te href=850087>Patroller</te> Chixia's packages are mostly snacks and hero play merchs. She was so stoked last time she got one, she practically bounced out of the room!

Voices.Title: About Youhu
Voices.Content: Youhu's packages always come with insurance, full of pricey antiques. I don't know much about these stuff, but the way she handles them, you can tell they're her treasures.

Voices.Title: About Baizhi
Voices.Content: Researcher Baizhi's packages weigh a ton! Mostly stacks of books, thick ones, and a bunch of other weird stuff. Said those are for research purposes...

Voices.Title: About Zhezhi
Voices.Content: Actually, I rarely get to meet Miss Zhezhi in person… She's a night owl, barely out during the day. So I've been dropping her paints and paper at her door.

Voices.Title: Birthday Wishes
Voices.Content: Auntie Panhua's letting me use her stove today. In my village, we celebrate birthdays with steaming longevity noodles like this, topped with two braised eggs! Hey, you gotta slurp it all in one go, no biting allowed! Hehe… Happy birthday! May your journey ahead always be bright.

Voices.Title: Idle: I
Voices.Content: Not delivered yet?...Come on...

Voices.Title: Idle: II
Voices.Content: *Effort Sound*

Voices.Title: Idle: III
Voices.Content: Squeakie! Enough playing with the letter!

Voices.Title: Self-Introduction
Voices.Content: Greetings! Lumi here! Need to send some mail? I've got you covered as <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>' professional navigator!

Voices.Title: Greeting
Voices.Content: Don't worry, my light's got you!

Voices.Title: Join Team: I
Voices.Content: Right on time!

Voices.Title: Join Team: II
Voices.Content: A new page in my journal!

Voices.Title: Join Team: III
Voices.Content: Lighting up your way.

Voices.Title: Ascension: I
Voices.Content: Is it just me, or is the light bulb on my tail brighter than before?

Voices.Title: Ascension: II
Voices.Content: To chart new routes for <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>, physical training is a must.

Voices.Title: Ascension: III
Voices.Content: You're an amazing teacher! Didya know? Squeakie's jumping higher and faster after your pointers!

Voices.Title: Ascension: IV
Voices.Content: They used to call me Jolly Sun in my village. I prefer Lumi though! The sun sets at night, but I'm always ready to illuminate someone's way home!

Voices.Title: Ascension: V
Voices.Content: So, you are saying I'm already a top-notch navigator? Really?… No, no, don't get too comfortable, Lumi! There's still a long way to go, gotta keep it up!

Voices.Title: Resonance Liberation: I
Voices.Content: Squeakie, get 'em baddies!

Voices.Title: Resonance Liberation: II
Voices.Content: Squeakie, protect the cargo!

Voices.Title: Resonance Liberation: III
Voices.Content: Squeakie, clear the way!

Voices.Title: Intro Skill
Voices.Content: Together!

Voices.Title: Hit: I
Voices.Content: Squeakie, watch out!

Voices.Title: Hit: II
Voices.Content: It's breaking!

Voices.Title: Injured: I
Voices.Content: Time is ticking!

Voices.Title: Injured: II
Voices.Content: Cargo damaged!

Voices.Title: Injured: III
Voices.Content: Squeakie, run...

Voices.Title: Fallen: I
Voices.Content: Navigation... failed...

Voices.Title: Fallen: II
Voices.Content: Luminous no more...

Voices.Title: Echo Summon
Voices.Content: Awesome!

Voices.Title: Echo Transform
Voices.Content: Watch this!

Voices.Title: Enemies Near
Voices.Content: Squeakie, alert!

Voices.Title: Glider
Voices.Content: The higher, the better!

Voices.Title: Sensor
Voices.Content: Here it is!

Voices.Title: Supply Chest: I
Voices.Content: Woah, a great find!

Voices.Title: Supply Chest: II
Voices.Content: Lucky me!

Voices.Title: Supply Chest: III
Voices.Content: Check this out, Squeakie!

Goods.Title: Lollo Marker
Goods.Content:
Crafted by <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>, this pen has journeyed alongside Lumi throughout Solaris. She uses it to sign logistics documents and chronicle her adventures in her travel journal. 
In her travels, Lumi has crossed paths with fascinating and kind-hearted strangers, savored local delicacies and quirky snacks, and documented bizarre <te href=850081>Tacet Discords</te> that remain uncharted... even the lighthearted anecdotes shared by her colleagues find their way into her travel journal, recorded with joy and enthusiasm.

Goods.Title: Navigator Baton
Goods.Content:
When Lumi first joined <te href=850090>Lollo Logistics</te>, she faced challenges in mastering her Forte. 
Under the guidance of a seasoned mentor, she fashioned this field command baton, which became her steadfast companion through her most anxious days. It witnessed her transformation from a trembling novice into a skilled navigator, and eventually, a trusted team leader. 
In the dark of night, the baton's shimmering hue casts a reassuring glow, a symbol of Lumi's growth.

Goods.Title: Squeakie Plushie
Goods.Content:
A stress-relief squeeze plushie, designed by Lumi in the likeness of her beloved companion, Squeakie.
As life unfolds, Lumi faces many unexpected challenges. While she adeptly navigates her own challenges, the struggles of others can be quite a handful—each person's wishes and expectations are as varied as the packages she manages.
While she's alone, Lumi sometimes squeezes the plushie tightly, letting the weight of her worries dissipate with each squeeze.

SpecialCook.Name: Yuezhou Spicy Meat Noodles
SpecialCook.Desc: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 28%, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.

Skill.Name: Navigation Support
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Basic Attack</color></size>
Summon Squeakie to shoot three shots in a row, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Sprint</color></size> 
Dodge to perform <color=Highlight>Sprint</color> and enter <color=Highlight>Zoom Mode</color>. Lumi is unable to Dodge when performing <color=Highlight>Sprint</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Zoom</color></size>
When in this state, automatically shoot <color=Highlight>Glitters</color> at a locked-on target and deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Plunging Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to strike the ground with Squeakie, causing an impact dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Plunging Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Dodge Counter</color></size>
Use Basic Attack right after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Basic Attack</color></size>
Deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Sprint</color></size>
Use Dodge to perform <color=Highlight>Sprint</color> and enter <color=Highlight>Zoom Mode</color>. Lumi is unable to Dodge when performing <color=Highlight>Sprint</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Zoom</color></size>
When in this state, automatically shoot <color=Highlight>Glitters</color> on a locked-on target and deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light: Plunging Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Basic Attack</color></size>
Deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Plunging Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light: Dodge Counter</color></size>
Deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Searchlight Service
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Pounce</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Yellow Light Mode</color>, use Resonance Skill to perform Pounce, which consumes STA to pounce on the target before switching to <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color>.
Lumi will perform a <color=Highlight>Pounce</color> without STA cost when switched onto the field.

<size=40><color=Title>Rebound</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color>, use Resonance Skill to perform Rebound, which consumes STA to leap backward and attack the target before switching to <color=Highlight>Yellow Light Mode</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light Mode</color></size>
Perform ranged attacks when in Yellow Light Mode.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light Mode</color></size>
Perform melee attacks when in Red Light Mode.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Pounce</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Yellow Light Mode</color>, use Resonance Skill to perform Pounce, which consumes STA to pounce on the target before switching to <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color>.
Lumi will <color=Highlight>Pounce</color> without STA cost when she is switched onto the field.

<size=40><color=Title>Rebound</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color>, use Resonance Skill to perform Rebound, which consumes STA to backflip and attack the target before switching to <color=Highlight>Yellow Light Mode</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light Mode</color></size>
Perform ranged attacks when in Yellow Light Mode.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light Mode</color></size>
Perform melee attacks when in Red Light Mode.

Skill.Name: Squeakie Express
Skill.Desc: Throw the giant Squeakie at the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Pathfinding
Skill.Desc: Gain {0} Electro DMG Bonus when in <te href=850044>Red Light Mode</te>.
Skill.SimpleDesc: Gain {0} Electro DMG Bonus when in Red Light Mode.

Skill.Name: Expediting
Skill.Desc: Casting <color=Highlight>Energized Pounce</color> or <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color> increases ATK by {1} for {0}s.
Skill.SimpleDesc: When performing <color=Highlight>Energized Pounce</color> or <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color>, ATK is increased by {1} for {0}s.

Skill.Name: Special Delivery
Skill.Desc: Enter <color=Highlight><te href=850043>Yellow Light Mode</te></color> and attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc: Enter <color=Highlight>Yellow Light Mode</color> and deal <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Signal Light
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Energized Pounce</color></size>
When Yellow Light Spark is fully recovered, replace Resonance Skill with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Energized Pounce</color> that deals <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and enter <color=Highlight>Red Spotlight Mode</color>. The DMG dealt is considered Basic Attack DMG.
When in <color=Highlight>Red Spotlight Mode</color>, the DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Red Light: Basic Attack</color> and <color=Highlight>Red Light: Heavy Attack</color> is increased, with an extra amount of Sparks recovered.
<color=Highlight>Red Spotlight Mode</color> ends after performing altogether 4 Basic Attacks and/or Heavy Attacks.

<size=40><color=Title>Energized Rebound</color></size>
When Red Light Spark is fully recovered, replace Resonance Skill with Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color> that deals <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and enter <color=Highlight>Yellow Spotlight Mode</color>. The DMG dealt is considered Basic Attack DMG.
When in <color=Highlight>Yellow Spotlight Mode</color>, <color=Highlight>Glitter</color> is replaced by <color=Highlight>Glare</color>, with an increased DMG Multiplier and an extra amount of Sparks recovered.
<color=Highlight>Yellow Spotlight Mode</color> ends after shooting 6 <color=Highlight>Glares</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Laser</color></size>
Casting Outro Skill consumes all Sparks obtained in the current mode.
Laser can be cast when the amount of consumed Sparks is greater than or equal to {0}, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.  The DMG dealt is considered Basic Attack DMG. 
Every {0} Sparks consumed generates {1} extra Laser beam, up to {2} Laser beams.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light Spark</color></size>
Lumi can hold up to {3} Yellow Light Sparks.
Lumi obtains Yellow Light Spark under the following conditions: 
When <color=Highlight>Yellow Light: Basic Attack</color> hits the target;
When <color=Highlight>Glitter</color> hits the target;
When <color=Highlight>Glare</color> hits the target;
When Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color> hits the target;
When casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Special Delivery</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light Spark</color></size>
Lumi can hold up to {3} Red Light Sparks.
Lumi obtains Red Light Spark under the following conditions:
When Normal Attack <color=Highlight>Navigation Support</color> hits the target in <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color> or <color=Highlight>Red Spotlight Mode</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Energized Pounce</color></size>
When Yellow Light Spark is full, Resonance Skill becomes <color=Highlight>Energized Pounce</color> which deals <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>, and Lumi enters <color=Highlight>Red Spotlight Mode</color> (the evolved version of <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color>).

<size=40><color=Title>Energized Rebound</color></size>
When Red Light Spark is full, Resonance Skill becomes <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color> which deals <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>, and Lumi enters <color=Highlight>Yellow Spotlight Mode</color> (the evolved version of <color=Highlight>Yellow Light Mode</color>).

<size=40><color=Title>Laser</color></size>
Casting Outro Skill consumes all Sparks gained in the current mode.
Laser can be cast when the amount of Sparks consumed is greater than or equal to {0}, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>. Consuming more Sparks generates more Laser beams.

<size=40><color=Title>Yellow Light Spark</color></size>
Lumi can hold up to {3} Sparks.
Lumi gains Yellow Light Spark when <color=Highlight>Yellow Light: Basic Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Glitter</color>, <color=Highlight>Glare</color>, or <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color> hits the target.
Lumi gains Yellow Light Spark when casting <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color>.

<size=40><color=Title>Red Light Spark</color></size>
Lumi can hold up to {3} Sparks.
Lumi gains Red Light Spark when <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> hits the target in <color=Highlight>Red Light Mode</color> or <color=Highlight>Red Spotlight Mode</color>.

Skill.Name: Escorting
Skill.Desc: The incoming Resonator has their Resonance Skill DMG Amplified by {0} for {1}s or until they are switched out.
Skill.SimpleDesc: The incoming Resonator has their Resonance Skill DMG Amplified by {0}. Switching Resonators ends the effect early.

Skill.Name: Tune Break: Broadblade
Skill.Desc: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
Skill.SimpleDesc: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.

1.Name: Parcel To Be Delivered
1.Desc: After casting <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color>, additionally recovers {1} STA within {0}s.

2.Name: Lollo Logistics, Ready to Help
2.Desc: <color=Highlight>Energized Pounce</color> and <color=Highlight>Energized Rebound</color> ignore {0} of the target's DEF.

3.Name: Priority Parcel In Transit
3.Desc: The DMG of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Squeakie Express</color> is increased by {0}.

5.Name: Parcel Collected On Time
5.Desc: When Spark is fully recovered, <color=Highlight>Laser</color> DMG Multiplier is increased by {0}.

6.Name: Give Me A Five-star Rating
6.Desc: Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Squeakie Express</color> increases all team members' ATK by {0} for {1}s.

81001504.Name: Lumi
81001504.BgDescription: A lightweight yet sturdy outfit, worn by Lollo Logistics Navigator Lumi. It has survived many arduous deliveries.

150401.Desc: Zoom: Use Dodge to enter the mode when in Yellow Light Mode.

150402.Desc: Energized Pounce: Tap {0} to cast it when Yellow Light Spark is full.

150403.Desc: Energized Rebound: Tap {0} to cast it when Red Light Spark is full.

DescList:
Lumi can switch between Yellow Light Mode and Red Light Mode by using Resonance Skill.
Hitting a target with Normal Attacks restores the Forte Gauge of the active mode while casting Intro Skill restores Yellow Light Spark.
When Forte Gauge is full, use Resonance Skill to cast the Energized attack and enter Spotlight Mode.
